description:
With this course as your guide, you will simply and easily make raw, organic, fair trade dark chocolate sweetened with honey (or sweetener of choice) easily in your home kitchen.

The courses' two videos and Resource Page will guide you step by step. You don't need any thermometers or fancy equipment.

You can make a batch of 50 delicious healthy chocolates in about an hour. Then refrigerate the chocolate and when it's set and you taste it, Wow! will become your favorite word.

Raw, organic, fair trade, dark chocolate sweetened with honey is so healthy and good for your immune system, improving your mood, reducing stress and anxiety and deepening your connection to those you love. But it's difficult to find. So we sourced some amazing ingredients and tools (which we share on our Resource page) and created an easy to follow recipe.

If you like to eat healthy food and share it with your friends and eat more (completely guilt-free) chocolate, this is the course for you.
title: Belly of the Goddess Chocolate-Making Workshop
